title: Llangollen-based hotel group marks 10th anniversary with AI revolution creating 100 new jobs
description: A hotel group celebrating its 10th anniversary and investing in the power of Artificial Intelligence to drive growth and create 100 new jobs.
content:
The Everbright Group, which operates the Wild Pheasant Hotel & Spa in Llangollen, says using AI is enabling them to significantly reduce costs and provide a better, more personal service for guests.
At the same time, the company is also looking to us... [4064 chars]

title: US senators push new bill to track how AI is taking or creating jobs
description: A new bill aims to introduce quarterly requirements for major firms and federal agencies to disclose workforce changes, such as AI-driven hires, layoffs, and retraining, to the Department of Labor, reflecting growing concern around artificial intelligence’s impact on jobs.
content: A new bill set to be introduced in the US Senate could soon require significant changes in how companies and federal agencies report the impact of artificial intelligence on their workforces. According to information provided by PYMNTS.com, the draft... [3165 chars]

title: As Russian drone incursions rattle Europe, Poland and Romania deploy a new defensive system
description: Poland and Romania are deploying a new drone defense system. The American Merops system uses artificial intelligence to counter threats. This move strengthens NATO's eastern border against Russian drone incursions. The alliance aims to deter any aggression. This technology is crucial given recent airspace violations. It offers a cost-effective solution compared to traditional air defense.
content:

title: US Has Most October Layoffs in Over 20 Years on AI and Cost Cuts
description: US companies announced the most job cuts for any October in more than two decades as artificial intelligence reshapes industries and cost-cutting accelerates, according to data from outplacement firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas Inc.
content:

title: Youdao to Report Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results on November 20
description: HANGZHOU, China, Nov. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Youdao, Inc. ('Youdao' or the 'Company') (NYSE: DAO), an AI-powered solutions provider specializing in artificial intelligence applications for the learning and advertising verticals, today announced that it will report its third quarter 2025 financial results on Thursday, November 20, 2025, before the open of the U.S. markets.

title: MediTrust Health Shares Insights at Hong Kong Fintech Week: AI Pragmatically Reshaping Cross
description: Hong Kong, November 6: MediTrust Health, the largest innovative healthcare payor platform in China, delivered key insights recently at the HealthTech Forum of 'Hong Kong FinTech Week 2025.' Seth Zhang, Founder and CEO of MediTrust Health, stated that Artificial Intelligence (AI) is bringing disruptive innovation to the traditional insurance sector, with cross-border services emerging as a new industry trend. He emphasized that the company would leverage Hong Kong as a hub for expansion into overseas markets, highlighting its successful use cases in the Greater Bay Area (GBA) as a valuable reference for the industry.

title: Google DeepMind is hiring an AI Economist, to study what happens after machines match humans
description: Google’s AI arm, DeepMind is looking for an AI Economist. As per the listing, the role will revolve around understanding the impact of AI once it reaches artificial general intelligence (AGI), a stage where AI models can think just like humans.
content: Artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming the world in virtually all sectors. However, Google DeepMind is already looking at the potential impact of AI on our society once it reaches human-level thinking or artificial general intelligence (AGI). D... [1949 chars]

title: AI tops workplace priorities in India, surpasses pay and burnout issues: Report
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has become the most influential factor on how Indians approach work, surpassing pay and burnout as the top workplace priority, said a report on Thursday.
content:
Artificial intelligence (AI) has become the most influential factor on how Indians approach work, surpassing pay and burnout as the top workplace priority, said a report on Thursday.

title: KBC 17: Amitabh Bachchan jokes AI might replace him as host
description: In the latest episode of 'Kaun Banega Crorepati' 17, Amitabh Bachchan stated his concern that artificial intelligence is being used for many tasks and expressed fear of being replaced as host.
